org.aion.api

Interface IAccount


  • public interface IAccount
    This interface dedicate to account manipulations.
    Author:
    Jay Tseng

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiMsg accountBackup(java.util.List<Key> keys)
      Export accounts by given the password and the account address
      ApiMsg accountCreate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> passphrase, boolean privateKey)
      Create new accounts by given password.
      ApiMsg accountExport(java.util.List<Key> keys)

    • Method Detail

      • accountCreate

        ApiMsg accountCreate(java.util.List<java.lang.String> passphrase,
                     boolean privateKey)
        Create new accounts by given password.
        Parameters:
        passphrase - the interface List of the class String represent the passphrase choose for each new generate account.
        privateKey - The boolean value represent the key return including the private key or just the account address.
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class Key wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 100 new Keys if user put more than 100 passphrases.

      • accountExport

        ApiMsg accountExport(java.util.List<Key> keys)
        Export accounts by given the password and the account address
        Parameters:
        keys - the interface List of the class Key object represent the passphrase and the account public address.
        Returns:
        the class KeyExport include the 64 bytes private key as a List of ByteArrayWrapper and invalid address list wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 100 Keys if user try to export more then 100 account.

      • accountBackup

        ApiMsg accountBackup(java.util.List<Key> keys)
        Export accounts by given the password and the account address
        Parameters:
        keys - the interface List of the class Key represent the passphrase and the account public address.
        Returns:
        KeyExport include the keyfiles as a List of ByteArrayWrapper and invalid address list wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only return the first 100 Keys if user try to export more then 100 accounts.

      • accountImport

        ApiMsg accountImport(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> keys)
        Import accounts by given the password and the account address
        Parameters:
        keys - the interface Map of the class String object represent the passphrase and the account private key as a string.
        Returns:
        the interface List of the class String represent the invalid account address. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

        The kernel will only accept the first 100 Keys import. The the user try to import account more than 100. The import keys after 100 will be returned as the invalid account addresses.
